name: NATIONAL ASSN OF STATE TREASURERS (NAST)
sampleDescriptions: IRC sec. 529, 529A; and tax exempt financing issues; Issues related to taxation of municipal bonds; Tax Reform proposals; H.R. 529, S. 1790; H.R. 5003;  Implementation of H.R. 1, Tax Cuts and Jobs Act
Proposals related to securities and banking laws for IRC section 529 plans including prepaid tuition plans; Liquidity Coverage Ratio, rule H.R. 1624 and S. 828; issues related to municipal securities
Pension issues affecting municipal bonds or public pensions.
Higher education reauthorization proposals pertaining to college savings.  H.R. 529; H.R. 4508, Prosper Act.
